controller.hrs

Class ReservationController

  • Object
    • PersistenceController
      • ReservationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller, ReservationInterface

    public class ReservationController
extends PersistenceController
implements ReservationInterface
    ReservationController is a controller that performs reservation operations.
    Author:
    YingHao

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cancelReservation(View view)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information to cancel a reservation.

      Reserves a room for the specified Reservation.
      protected void safeOnOptionSelected(View view, int option)
      Subclasses of PersistenceController should implement this method instead of PersistenceController.onOptionSelected(View, int).
      void searchReservation(View view)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information to search for a reservation.
      private void updateBedType(View view, Reservation reservation)
      Displays available bed types and number of available rooms with that bed type and prompts the user to select a BedType to be populated into the criteria attribute of the specified reservation.
      private void updateBillingInformation(View view, Guest guest, BillingInformation billing)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information for billing information and populates the BillingInformation parameter with the information.
      private void updateRoomCriteria(View view, Reservation reservation)
      Prompts the user to enter relevant information for their desired room and populates the criteria attribute of the provided reservation parameter.
      private void updateRoomType(View view, Reservation reservation)
      Displays available room types and number of available rooms with that room type and prompts the user to select a RoomType to be populated into the criteria attribute of the specified reservation.
      private void updateSmokingStatus(View view, Reservation reservation)
      Displays number of available rooms that allows smoking and prompts the user to select a requirement to be populated into the criteria attribute of the specified reservation.
      private void updateView(View view, Reservation reservation)
      Displays available room views and number of available rooms with that view and prompts the user to select a view to be populated into the criteria attribute of the specified reservation.
      private void updateWifiStatus(View view, Reservation reservation)
      Displays number of available wifi-enabled rooms and prompts the user to select a requirement to be populated into the criteria attribute of the specified reservation.

                             throws Exception

        Specified by:

        private void updateRoomCriteria(View view,

      • updateRoomType

        private void updateRoomType(View view,
                  Reservation reservation)
                     throws Exception
        Displays available room types and number of available rooms with that room type and prompts the user to select a RoomType to be populated into the criteria attribute of the specified reservation.
        Parameters:
        view - - A view interface that provides input/output.
        reservation - - Reservation instance that this method will base on for the start and end date.
        Throws:
        Exception
